figure_1: We are unable to share examples of the stimuli from Experiments 1 and 2 because of copyright issues.
figure_2: The boxplots describe data combined across all three experiments. Boxes indicate interquartile ranges. Bold horizontal lines indicate medians. Red dots indicated means. Black dots indicate outliers.
figure_3: We are unable to share examples of the stimuli from Experiment 4 because of copyright issues.
figure_4: The boxplots describe data combined across both experiments. Boxes indicate interquartile ranges. Bold horizontal lines indicate medians. Red dots indicated means. Black dots indicate outliers.
